from typing import TypedDict, Optional

import requests

API_VERSION: int = 10
TOKEN: str = "MTExNTcxNjg2Mzk2ODY3Mzg1NA.GQHXcU.aD5JN0BKr8Ohky6YDW0IAwzoBvJjvPTvUv3jQs"

PAYLOAD = TypedDict("PAYLOAD", {"content": Optional[str]})
HEADERS = TypedDict("HEADERS", {"authorization": str})
ENDPOINT_URL: str = f"https://discord.com/api/v{API_VERSION}/channels/1115717164482187304/messages"



[docs]def send_message(content: str) -> requests.Response:
    payload: PAYLOAD = PAYLOAD(content=content)
    headers: HEADERS = HEADERS(authorization=TOKEN)

    response = requests.post(url=ENDPOINT_URL, data=payload, headers=headers)
    response.raise_for_status()
    return response


messages: int = 0

while True:
    try:
        response: requests.Response = send_message("Siemka!")
        messages += 1
        print(response.status_code)
        print(response.json())
    except requests.exceptions.HTTPError:
        break
    if response.status_code != 200:
        break

print(f"Done: {messages}")
